title: PAN-Aadhaar Linking Deadline Extended Till March 31, 2023 By Finance Ministry - Live Law - Indian Legal News
content: PAN-Aadhaar Linking Deadline Extended Till March 31, 2023 By Finance Ministry  Live Law - Indian Legal News
description: The Ministry of Finance has extended the deadline for linking PAN Card with Aadhaar number till March 31, 2023. The deadline was otherwise set to end tomorrow.A Press Release issued by the
